title: Watch Face BSOD
summary: Blue Screen Of Death Watch Face for Android Wear Clock
description: Fun your friends with windows Blue Screen Of Death Watch Watch Face. Clean and fast watchface for everyday use.FEATURES:- Watch and Phone Battery information- Date information- 12/24 auto-format- Ambient (dimmed) mode- High Resolution Design- Round and Square watches SupportINSTRUCTION:1. Install Watch Face2. Wait a minute2. Go to Android Wear Application3. Choose BSOD Watch Face4. Enjoy!The watch face clock has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch and other.
descriptionHTML:
Fun your friends with windows Blue Screen Of Death Watch Watch Face. Clean and fast watchface for everyday use.

FEATURES:

- Watch and Phone Battery information
- Date information
- 12/24 auto-format
- Ambient (dimmed) mode
- High Resolution Design
- Round and Square watches Support

INSTRUCTION:

1. Install Watch Face
2. Wait a minute
2. Go to Android Wear Application
3. Choose BSOD Watch Face
4. Enjoy!

The watch face clock has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch and other.
comments: I loved this watch face and it was always an ice breaker for conversion when people noticed. Now, it doesn't seem compatible with my watch at all? All other apps and faces with fine and everyone is connected... Just not showing up as a watch face anymore.   Zen Watch 3/Galaxy Note8
Great watchface. Time and percentages don't show up in line with the text on my Huawei watch though, if this could be fixed it would be amazing
The time gets covered up when there is a card preview
Can the time be higher? I love the face, but would love to see the time above my cards.
Nice idea and design I like it but please make text as large as possible for readability. I have the lg g watch w100 first gen.
Not working Would not display on Android Wear app using Nexus 6P and Huawei Watch.
recentChanges: + Added Phone and Watch Battery Information
